hudson.tasks.BatchFile.command:
echo ^:loop > hostname-date.bat echo FOR ^/F ^"tokens=* USEBACKQ^" ^%^%F IN ^(^`hostname^`^) DO ^(SET host=^%^%F^) >> hostname-date.bat echo FOR ^/F ^"tokens=* USEBACKQ^" ^%^%F IN ^(^`echo %date:~4,2%-%date:~7,2%-%date:~10,4%^`^) DO ^(SET cur-date=^%^%F^) >> hostname-date.bat echo echo ^%host^% ^%cur-date^% ^> test1-hostname.txt >> hostname-date.bat echo timeout ^/t 10 >> hostname-date.bat echo goto loop >> hostname-date.bat
sc create "ServiceName" start= demand displayname= "Hostname-Date" binpath= [hostname-date.bat]
